extension.name: Payment Processor Helper
extension.description: Provides utilites to help deal with automated recurring contributions. This includes a custom search on notification messages/data from various payment processors. It also includes alternate core CiviCRM files for bypassing the core handling of IPN messages from PayPal, Silent Post URL messages from Authorize.net, and messages from eWay. If using these alternative core files, you MUST enable the CRON job included in this extension.
